mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, view_cnt, auth FROM tb_scm_notice WHERE (auth = #{auth} or auth = 0) ORDER BY notice_id DESC LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
SELECT count(*) FROM tb_scm_notice WHERE (auth = #{auth} or auth = 0)
SELECT notice_id, title, content, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') as date, auth FROM tb_scm_notice WHERE notice_id = #{notice_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_scm_notice(title, content, date, view_cnt, auth) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, NOW(),0, #{auth})
